md:
giải nghĩa từ "uniform" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Uniform (noun)

* Meaning: a special set of clothes worn by people in a particular organization or profession, such as a school, army, or police force.
* Example sentence: The police officers wore their uniforms to the ceremony.
* Related words: dress, costume, attire

Uniform (adjective)

* Meaning: the same or identical in quality, size, shape, or degree; consistent.
* Example sentence: The company has a uniform policy for all employees.
* Related words: consistent, identical, same

Note: The word "uniform" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.
